wordGroup: be cautious of 留心…；谨防…

sentences.en: They've taken a very cautious approach.
sentences.cn: 他们采取了十分谨慎的态度。

sentences.en: He was cautious of his footing, wary of the edge.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地站稳，注意着边缘。

sentences.en: Employers may become overly cautious about taking on new staff.
sentences.cn: 雇主在雇用新员工的问题上可能会过于谨慎。
